Version 2.0.28 - PHP-Level suspend_data Modification

Major Improvement

  • PHP-level suspend_data modification BEFORE SCORM player loads
  • New lzstring_helper.php - PHP port of LZ-String library
  • Modifies database directly - JavaScript interception was too late
  • Supports Moodle 4.x (normalized tables) and legacy structure

Technical Details

  • embed_renderer.php: modify_suspend_data_for_slide() method
  • Handles scorm_scoes_value (4.x) and scorm_scoes_track (legacy)
  • LZ-String compress/decompress for Articulate Storyline format
  • Modifies "l" field in suspend_data to target slide position

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.27: Correct suspend_data interpretation (Poll is truth)
  • v2.0.26: Skip score-based position during intercept
  • v2.0.24: Unlimited intercepts within 10s window
  • v2.0.22: Re-enable write interception (l field only)
